name: I STRAIN MY GRAIN
description:
WARNING: This game is designed to be a painful audiovisual experience. It contains loud noises, potentially disturbing eye imagery, a frankly ridiculous amount of flashing lights. 

How to play:
Use the keys 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 to move the eye and attempt to fill a glass. Each key corresponds to one of five positions, randomized at the beginning of the game and every time a glass is successfully filled. If you land on an empty space or a glass that has already been filled, you fail.
To win, simply press five keys in the correct order.

Created by Anna Aa., with moral support from Harvey.
This is the first game I've made (mostly) independently, so please be merciful <3
